name: Alnico Smithery (demake)
description:
A fun demake of an actual game I hope to release on Steam soon! 

Alnico Smithery will be a laid-back forging sim with a stylized look in a medieval setting. There are over 50 metal alloys to discover, more than 20 different crafts to create, and a slew of interactive tools and machines to use to complete orders and earn coins to upgrade your forge.
